In a nebulan circus far away from the planet Earth, a large prize 
fighter =
rages out of control. 

"LET ME GO!!!"

"Not a chance champ.." Gonzo, the r=
ingmaster replied.

As the huge griffon paced in his cell he transformed to=
 his bot 
mode.  He bent over grabing the bars and with a heave of his arms=
 
bent them over.  As he walked out the small nebulan ran as fast he 
could=
. The large bot grabbed his rifle, nebulan bio-partner Muchos 
and aimed at=
 Gonzo.

"Auto" he called out.

"Online" the gun replied.

He pulled the tr=
igger half wayin and a laser shot out targeting the 
running nebulan.  With=
 the other half a pull withan a few seconds 
Gonzo was shreds.  

The bot s=
lung Muchos over his back and called out "Guarda, Hacha." 
Two more nebulan=
s ran to him, jumping up and transforming.  Guarda 
into a sheild and Hacha=
 into an double sided axe.  Wieldign them both 
he walked down out of his h=
olding tent into the big top.  

All of the performers stop dead in thier t=
racks after seeing him. One 
brave performer spoke up.  "H-How did you get =
out?"

"Shut up..." was the simple reply.  

The nebulans ran for thier liv=
es while some ran for weapons.  With a 
slice one way and another the other=
, 50 nebulans were dead.  The 
alrge fighter through his axe end over end c=
utting through nebulans 
before finally jamming in front of the exit.  

"Y=
ou wanted me to fight, so I fight..."

Muchos once again came over his shou=
lder to his hand.  

"Grenade"

"Online"

Thump thump thump...  Three grena=
des pumped out of the compact 
rifle.  The explosions took out another hund=
red nebulans.  Shots rang 
in from the nebulans who had weapons.  Guarda in=
tercepts them easily 
taking the hits to his energon shield body. 

"Torch"=


"Online"

 He turned and this time from the rifle a large blast of flame =

blasted out melting everything in it's path.  

--------------------------=
------------------------------------------
The big top was a ruin of flames=
 and tatters now as bloodshed was all 
over.  Hacha transformed and walked =
to a solitary tap still standing 
in the ruins.  
"I prefere oil over me ra=
ther than blood....kinda a zangy taste."  He 
washed off his engineered arm=
our.  

"At least you aren't covered in dents after every fight Hacha" came=
 
the reply from Guarda. Who took out a hammer and began to bang out 
his d=
ents.

"There always complaining about this or that. We were fine without 
=
them before for that tournament where we won them." Came the hasty 
comment=
 from Muchos

"Oh whatever, they help in battle that is all that matter. No=
w we 
have to steer this cruiser for Earth.  That is where this IGL is.  
M=
uchos get us on path." the prize fighter ordered.

"Uh oh" was all he said.=


"What?"

"Well, I guess one of those freaks reached the alarm, cuz we got=
 n 
army of bounty hunters on us, which means on thing compa=F1ero.  We are=
 
now fugitives."

"Ummm, punch it hermano."  

The ship jerked as it reach=
ed full momentum.  But it wasn't enough as 
the bounty ships caught up easi=
ly.  

"I have an idea..." Muchos said.

----------------------------------=
------------------------------------

Killer, the head bounty hunter, enter=
ed the circus ship and looked at 
the bloodshed. "They aren't here...."

Un=
known the prize fighter and now murderer, were escaping right 
beneath thie=
r noses  in a stealth escape pod. (what else would you 
escape in...)This w=
as jsut the beggining of thier goal to be top of
